snippet.title: PC Longplay [298] Rockman 8 FC
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: xRavenXP

This is a longplay of fan-made remake/demake of Rockman 8 from some Japanese person named "Mend". Take everything you know about Mega Man 8 and make a game in 8-Bit style. And no, this is not a ROM.

The differences between this version and the 8-bit original versions (released for PSX and Sega Saturn) is that there is the introductory stage (you already faces the robot masters), the bolts are collected in the same manner as Rockman 7 (for Super Nintendo), is destroying common enemies in order to find bolts and items like energy tanks can be purchased. The Duo Stage does not exist, yet this version became very well done and faithful. It also includes two versions of the theme song of Tengu Man. An excellent and faithful adaptation in 8-bit of Megaman 8 game. From the creators of Rockman 7 FC (played by Tsunao in our channel).

Tengu Man stage: 03:23
Clown Man stage: 09:21
Grenade Man stage: 17:01
Frost Man stage: 23:19
Aqua Man stage: 27:19 
Sword Man stage: 34:38
Search Man stage: 42:21
Astro Man: 47:56
Tengu Man stage (revisited, with second music theme): 54:32
Wily Stage 1: 1:00:45
Wily Stage 2: 1:03:47
Wily Stage 3: 1:10:19
Final Stage: 1:23:00 -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
